i1.name: Trial by Fire
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Gangplank''' periodically empowers his next [[basic attack]] to burn the target, dealing them{{ft|{{pp|55 to 310|color=true damage}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} over {{fd|2.5}} seconds.|{{pp|55/10 to 310/10|color=true damage}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over {{fd|2.5}} seconds.}}{{tip|turret|Turrets}} receive 50% reduced damage.

If '''Gangplank''' successfully hits a target with ''Trial by Fire'', he gains {{sti|ms|{{as|{{pp|15 to 30|key=%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds. Every time a {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}} explodes, the {{sti|cooldown}} for ''Trial by Fire'' resets and '''Gangplank''' gains its {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}.
''Trial by Fire'' cannot be applied with {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} nor {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Gangplank periodically empowers his next basic attack to burn the target, dealing themTurrets receive 50% reduced damage.
If Gangplank successfully hits a target with Trial by Fire, he gains 15% − 30% (based on level) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Every time a Gangplank's Powder Keg explodes, the cooldown for Trial by Fire resets and Gangplank gains its bonus movement speed.
Trial by Fire cannot be applied with Gangplank's Parrrley nor Gangplank's Powder Keg.
i1.notes:
* Reapplying ''Trial by Fire'' before a previous application has run out will stack the full damage, instead of refreshing the duration.
* If the attack is {{tip|dodge|dodged}} or if '''Gangplank''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}, the effect is not applied nor does ''Trial by Fire'' go on cooldown. If the attack is {{tip|block|blocked}}, the effect is not applied, but ''Trial by Fire'' will go on cooldown.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[buildings]] nor [[ward]]s.

q1.name: Parrrley
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' fires a shot at the target enemy that deals {{as|physical damage}} upon arrival and applies {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness as a {{tip|ranged}} attack.

If ''Parrrley'' kills the target, '''Gangplank''' plunders {{gold|gold}} and {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}}. Each enemy killed by a {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}} explosion that was originally set off by ''Parrrley'' also counts for the plunder.
{{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}} can be spent in the [[shop]] to upgrade {{ai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gangplank fires a shot at the target enemy that deals physical damage upon arrival and applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness as a ranged attack.
Parrrley can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) total damage.Unknown value: bug / 2
If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders Unknown value: gold / gold and Gangplank's Silver Serpents. Each enemy killed by a Gangplank's Powder Keg explosion that was originally set off by Parrrley also counts for the plunder.
Gangplank's Silver Serpents can be spent in the shop to upgrade Gangplank's Cannon Barrage.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 120}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}}}}
{{st|Critical Damage|{{ap|20*1.75 to 120*1.75}} (+{{ii|Infinity Edge|icononly = true}}{{ap|20*0.35 to 120*0.35}}) {{as|(+ 175% (+{{ii|Infinity Edge|icononly = true}} 35%) AD)}}}}{{bug|2}}

{{st|Gold Plunder|{{g|{{ap|3 to 7}}}}}}
{{st|Silver Serpent Plunder|{{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank|icononly=yes}} {{ap|4 to 8}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Parrrley'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* {{tip|On-hit}} effects that deal damage to secondary targets will allow ''Parrrley'' to plunder from enemies killed that way, much like with {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank|Powder Kegs}}.
** {{ii|Ravenous Hydra}}, {{ii|Titanic Hydra}} and {{iis|Sunfire Aegis}} ''Flametouch'' (reapplication corresponding to the attack) work like this and will grant additional plunder from enemies they kill when triggered by ''Parrrley'' as their {{tip|cast instance}}.
** Even spell effects such as {{iis|Luden's Tempest}} ''Echo'' will work with this when triggered by ''Parrrley'' as their {{tip|cast instance}}. Spell effects that do not belong to their triggering cast instance, such as {{iis|Liandry's Anguish}} and {{iis|Demonic Embrace}} damage debuffs, do not grant plunder for enemies they kill.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}

w1.name: Remove Scurvy
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} himself from all {{tip|crowd control}} and {{tip|heal|healing}} himself.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, cleansing himself from all crowd control and healing himself.
w1.notes:
* ''Remove Scury'' does not remove {{tip|debuff|debuffs}} other than {{tip|crowd control}}, even if both occur from the same effect. For example, ''Remove Scurvy'' will dispel the {{tip|slow}} from {{si|Exhaust}}, but not its [[damage modifier|damage reduction]].
* ''Remove Scurvy'' can remove the underlying {{tip|stun}} from {{tip|airborne}}, but a {{tip|blink}} or {{tip|dash}} ability is required to override the displacement.

effects.str: • Heal: (+ 90% AP) (+ 13% missing health)

e1.name: Powder Keg
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' consumes a charge to place a powder keg at the target location that lasts for 25 seconds and will connect to other kegs with overlapping connection radius with a trail of black powder. The keg starts with 3 health and loses 1 every {{pp|2;1;0.5|1;7;13}} seconds until it is left with 1 health. He periodically [[stocks]] up on a new keg up to a maximum amount.

Kegs can be [[basic attack]]ed by enemies or '''Gangplank''' (including his {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}), dealing 1 damage to it. When an enemy destroys it, it is safely defused. When '''Gangplank''' destroys it, it explodes and also triggers a chain reaction that explodes other nearby connected kegs with a {{rutngt|0.3}}-delay between explosions. The explosions also grant {{tip|sight}} in their radiuses for 2 seconds.

Enemies caught in an explosion are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for 2 seconds and are dealt the triggering {{as|attack's damage}}, dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} against {{tip|champion|champions}}. Each enemy can only be damaged once per chain and the damage dealt ignores {{as|40% of their {{sti|armor penetration|armor}}}}.
If the triggering attack was a {{tip|critical strike}}, the explosions deal 25% more damage on top of the critical damage.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gangplank consumes a charge to place a powder keg at the target location that lasts for 25 seconds and will connect to other kegs with overlapping connection radius with a trail of black powder. The keg starts with 3 health and loses 1 every 1;7;13 ‒ undefined seconds until it is left with 1 health. He periodically stocks up on a new keg up to a maximum amount.
Kegs can be basic attacked by enemies or Gangplank (including his Gangplank's Parrrley), dealing 1 damage to it. When an enemy destroys it, it is safely defused. When Gangplank destroys it, it explodes and also triggers a chain reaction that explodes other nearby connected kegs with a 0.33-delay between explosions. The explosions also grant sight in their radiuses for 2 seconds.
Enemies caught in an explosion are slowed for 2 seconds and are dealt the triggering attack's damage, dealing bonus physical damage against champions. Each enemy can only be damaged once per chain and the damage dealt ignores 40% of their armor.
If the triggering attack was a critical strike, the explosions deal 25% more damage on top of the critical damage.
e1.notes:
* The triggering attack's damage can include {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}'s base damage and {{tip|Spellblade}}. * When triggered with critical strike, ''Spellblade'' and the bonus damage to champions are added after the calculations, meaning that these effects are not increased by 25%. * The total damage can be easily calculated with this formula:
{aDMG * [1.75 ({{ii|Infinity Edge|+ 0.35}})] * 1.25} + sDMG + cDMG
Where: ** aDMG = Triggering attack's damage ** sDMG = Spellblade's damage ** cDMG = Bonus damage to champions * Kegs have special interactions with {{tip|Spellblade}}: ** If the keg destroying attack was empowered with ''Spellblade'', its damage will be added to the explosions' damage. ** If the keg was not destroyed, it will consume the effect and the keg will store the damage it would have dealt. If the storing keg is the initial detonation of the chain, it will add its damage to the explosions' damage as it was triggered with ''Spellblade''. ** If the storing keg was attacked with a new instance of ''Spellblade'', it will override the previously stored damage (if different). ** Damage can only be stored if ''Spellblade'' was consumed by '''Gangplank''. ** The stored damage is static and will not change if '''Gangplank's''' '''base''' attack damage or ability power (see below) changes. * Specific {{tip|Spellblade}} item interactions: ** {{ii|Trinity Force}}: Attacking kegs or dealing damage to champions with the explosion does not increase the {{as|base attack damage}}. ** {{ii|Divine Sunderer}}: Explosions always apply the minimum damage of this item and does not apply the heal. ** {{ii|Lich Bane}}: The {{as|magic damage}} will be added to the explosions' damage, but will be dealt as {{as|physical damage}}. ** {{ii|Essence Reaver}}: Consuming the effect on kegs will restore {{as|mana}}. Explosions does not trigger this. * Placed barrels do '''not''' grant {{tip|sight|vision}} until they explode, but they are revealed to '''Gangplank'''. ** If '''Gangplank''' loses allied vision, for instance due to {{tip|nearsight}}, he will also lose vision on his barrels temporarily. ** Barrels prematurely grant {{tip|sight}} of their explosion radius (including across terrain and into bushes) if {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} or a lit fuse is travelling towards them. *** This area reveal happens even if {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} is not going to make it explode. * An exploding ''Powder Keg'' will splash {{ais|Parrrley|Gangplank}} '''bonus''' damage, and will also be modified if the attack {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}}. * Attacks against ''Powder Kegs'' will apply [[on-hit]] effects (such as {{iis|Tiamat}} {{nie|Cleave}}), but {{tip|proc damage}} against the barrel itself is reduced to 0. ** Damage from [[on-hit]] effects will '''not''' increase the damage of the explosion. ** {{tip|Spellblade}} is a {{tt|special-cased exception|Since late Season 9 - previously, Spellblade worked simply because it would add to the attack's damage directly}}. * {{iis|Dead Man's Plate}} {{nie|Crushing Blow}} will not trigger from ''Powder Kegs'' destroyed from '''Gangplank''', even with {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}. * '''Gangplank''' stocks ''Powder Kegs'' even if the ability hasn't been learned yet. ** This is due to the recharge rate at level 1 being set the same as level 0. ** While at maximum charges, ranking up the ability to rank 3 or 5 grants the remaining charge immediately regardless of the recharge timer.

r1.name: Cannon Barrage
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target location for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for the duration. Each wave deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 30% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''Gangplank''' can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500 {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}} each, which improve ''Cannon Barrage'':

{{sbc|{{ii|Death's Daughter}}:}} A large cannonball lands in the center of the barrage after the first cluster of waves occur, dealing a cluster's worth of {{as|true damage}} to enemies within the impact and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

{{sbc|{{ii|Fire at Will}}:}} ''Cannon Barrage'' fires{{ft|6 additional waves|2 additional clusters}} over its duration; 18 waves of cannonballs are called down in clusters of 3 every {{fd|1.3{{recurring|3}}}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ii|Raise Morale}}:}} ''Cannon Barrage'' grants '''Gangplank''' and all allies within the area {{sti|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, lingering for 2 seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gangplank shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target location for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and granting sight of the area for the duration. Each wave deals magic damage to all enemies within the area and slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.
Gangplank can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500 Gangplank's Silver Serpents each, which improve Cannon Barrage:
Death's Daughter: A large cannonball lands in the center of the barrage after the first cluster of waves occur, dealing a cluster's worth of true damage to enemies within the impact and slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.
Fire at Will: Cannon Barrage fires over its duration; 18 waves of cannonballs are called down in clusters of 3 every 1.3Unknown value: recurring / 3 seconds.
Raise Morale: Cannon Barrage grants Gangplank and all allies within the area 30% bonus movement speed, lingering for 2 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage Per Wave|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Magic Damage Per Cluster|{{ap|40*3 to 100*3}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*3}}% AP)}}}}
{{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|40*12 to 100*12}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*12}}% AP)}}}}

{{st|True Damage with {{ii|Death's Daughter}}|{{ap|40*3 to 100*3}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*3}}% AP)}}}}
{{st|Total Mixed Damage with {{ii|Death's Daughter}}|{{ap|40*12+40*3 to 100*12+100*3}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*12+10*3}}% AP)}}}}

{{st|Total Magic Damage with {{ii|Fire at Will}}|{{ap|40*18 to 100*18}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*18}}% AP)}}}}
{{st|Maximum Mixed Total Damage with {{ii|Fire at Will}} and {{ii|Death's Daughter}}|{{ap|40*18+40*3 to 100*18+100*3}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*18+10*3}}% AP)}}}}
r1.notes: * ''Cannon Barrage's'' slow lingers for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after affected enemies leave the target area.
